name: discourse
description: Discourse is a modern forum platform built for hosting online communities. It supports real-time notifications, threaded discussions, and plugins, with a responsive UI for mobile and desktop, and can be self-hosted or cloud-managed.
features: Modern Forums: Real-time discussions with threaded conversations. Engaging community platform.
Mobile Responsive: Perfect experience on phones and tablets. Discuss anywhere, anytime.
Rich Notifications: Stay updated with real-time alerts. Never miss important discussions.
Plugin Ecosystem: Extend functionality with thousands of plugins. Customize to your needs.
Moderation Tools: Powerful features for managing communities. Keep discussions healthy.
Self-Hosted: Own your community platform completely. No third-party control over discussions.
